'''1.21.7 Release Candidate 1''' (known as '''1.21.7-rc1''' in the [[launcher]]) is the first [[Version types#Release candidates|release candidate]] for [[Java Edition 1.21.7]], released on June 25, 2025.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-7-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.21.7 Release Candidate 1|June 25, 2025}}</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Music disc]]'''
* [[File:Music Disc Lava Chicken JE1 BE1.png|width=32x32]] Added the [[Music Disc Lava Chicken|"Lava Chicken" music disc]] by [[Hyper Potions]].
** Obtained by killing a [[chicken jockey]].
** Has a [[comparator]] output of 9 when played in a [[jukebox]].

''' [[Painting]]s '''
* Added a new [[Dennis (painting)|painting]] by [[Sarah Boeving]]:

!class="unsortable" scope="col"|Picture
!Name!!Size!!Artist

|style="text-align:center;"|[[File:Dennis (texture) JE1 BE1.png|48px]]

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Tag]]'''s
* Added {{cd|dennis}} to {{cd|#placeable}} painting variant tag.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MC|fixedin=1.21.7 Release candidate 1
|;From 1.21.5
|280354|Loading and unloading a resource pack that uses a x32000 atlas breaks the game.
|;From 1.21.6
|297748|The moon is rendered incorrectly on some Qualcomm graphics.
|298448|Filled maps are rendered incorrectly on some Qualcomm graphics.
|298681|Text displays with the "{{cd|shadow}}" tag enabled and the "{{cd|see_through}}" tag disabled exhibit z-plane fighting at a close distance.
|298710|TTF glyphs are incorrectly rendered over some elements.
|298818|Good boy is missing from Java Edition.
|298832|The breaking particles of droppers and dispensers facing up or down appear incorrect on some Qualcomm graphics.
|298856|Blindness and darkness fog effects no longer work underwater.
|298898|{{cd|TextureAtlas}} leaks textures after resource reload.
|298919|Sometimes you pass through the happy ghast when you get off while going forward.
|298986|Repeatedly reloading a 512x512 resource pack will eventually result in severe graphics corruption.
|299017|Text on glowing signs is not visible on some graphics.
|299071|Memory Leak in {{cd|ItemStackRenderState}} leads to {{cd|OutOfMemoryError}}.
}}</onlyinclude>
